short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhancing the github notifications page with information about pull requests that you're engaged in

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enhances the Github notifications page with all the pull requests that might be of interest to you - the ones you Created, are waiting for your Review, are Assigned to you or you are Mentioned in. It also adds a little "Notification" text to the page so that clicking the link is easier.
